leather.description: Leather provides sturdy protection against light weapons.

butchering.pork_description: Slice a piece of Raw Pork, producing four units of raw pork cuts that can be used as meat in cooking, cured or smoked.
butchering.pork_flavor: Pork cuts are considered red meat
butchering.duck_description: Slice a piece of Duck Meat, producing two units of raw duck cuts that can be used as meat in cooking, cured or smoked.
butchering.duck_flavor: Duck cuts are considered small white meat
butchering.mutton_description: Slice a piece of Raw Mutton, producing two units of raw mutton cuts that can be used as meat in cooking, cured or smoked.
butchering.mutton_flavor: Mutton cuts are considered small red meat
butchering.venison_description: Slice a piece of Raw Venison, producing three units of raw venison cuts that can be used as meat in cooking, cured or smoked.
butchering.venison_flavor: Venison cuts are considered small game meat
butchering.steak_description: Slice a piece of Raw Steak, producing two units of raw beef cuts that can be used as meat in cooking, cured or smoked.
butchering.steak_flavor: Beef cuts are considered red meat
butchering.varanus_description: Slice a piece of Raw Varanus, producing three units of raw varanus cuts that can be used as meat in cooking, cured or smoked.
butchering.varanus_flavor: Varanus cuts are considered small game meat
butchering.poyo_description: Slice a piece of Poyo Meat, producing two units of raw poyo cuts that can be used as meat in cooking, cured or smoked.
butchering.poyo_flavor: Poyo cuts are considered small white meat
butchering.poultry_description: Slice a piece of Raw Poultry, producing three units of raw poultry cuts that can be used as meat in cooking, cured or smoked.
butchering.poultry_flavor: Poultry cuts are considered small white meat
butchering.fish_description: Slice a fish, producing two units of fish meat that can be used as meat in cooking, cured or smoked.
butchering.fish_big_description: Slice a piece of Big Fish Meat, producing three units of fish meat that can be used as meat in cooking, cured or smoked.
butchering.fish_big_flavor: No one will believe how big it was, after you slice it!

craft_menu.description: Handles leather tanning, meat butchering and survival crafting.

perks.l1_description: The Trapper is able to build tannery facilities, extract tannins, dry fresh hides and prepare pelts.

block.description: Used by the Trapper for cleaning pelts and basic crafting.
block.recipe_description: Required for basic crafting, cleaning pelts and turning them into Rawhides which can then become Thin Leather in a Tanning Tub.

tanning_tub.description: Used to tan rawhide or raw skins into leather. Slightly increases their quality, but produces a foul smell.
tanning_tub.recipe_description: Used to tan rawhides or raw skins into Thin Leather or Thin Scaly Leather, respectively. Increases the quality of products by 1.
tanning_tub.flavor: Tanneries are usually built on the outskirts of towns due to their... particular smell.
tanning_tub.water_description: This tub requires tannin to be functional again.

drying_frame.description: Used to dry fresh large hides into useful pelts. Skins will take longer to dry and lose some quality.
drying_frame.recipe_description: Required for drying large pelts or skins. Skins will take longer to dry and have their quality reduced by 1.
drying_frame.flavor: It is NOT a jumping bed!

small_drying_frame.description: Can simultaneously dry up to eight small hides into useful pelts, can also dry bundles of fresh Saltbush.
small_drying_frame.recipe_description: Required for drying small pelts or fresh Saltbush bundles. Pelts can then be used in crafting or turned into rawhides which can then be tanned into leather.
small_drying_frame.flavor: Pelts are then cleaned into Rawhides by the Trapper itself!

input_rack_thin_leather.recipe_description: Provide your tannery with a special stockpile for recently finished leather.
input_rack_thin_leather.flavor: Holds up to 20 sheets of thin leather

input_rack_pelt_large.recipe_description: Supply your crafters with a pile of large pelts straight from the drying frames.

input_rack_pelt_small.recipe_description: Supply your crafters with a rack of small pelts ready for use.

output_rack_rawhide.recipe_description: An efficient storage for recently clean pelts to be stored before they can be tanned.

racoon_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hat for a small speed and diligence increase.
racoon_hat.worn_description: Slightly increasing the Trapper's speed and diligence.
racoon_hat.flavor: 'Ain't no thing like me, 'cept me!' - Rocket Raccoon

rabbit_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hat for a good compassion bonus and a small speed increase.
rabbit_hat.worn_description: Increasing the Trapper's compassion and slightly increasing speed.

squirrel_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hat for a small speed increase.

wolf_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hood for a good speed increase.

cougar_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hood for a good speed and diligence increase.
cougar_hat.worn_description: Increasing the Trapper's speed and diligence.
cougar_hat.flavor: Only a master of the hunt can wear this.

smokehouse.description: Useful for efficiently smoking or curing products, slightly increasing their quality as well.
smokehouse.recipe_description: A smokehouse can be used to efficiently cure certain products like raw meats and sausages into edible, tasty foods. It also increases the quality of its products by 1.
smokehouse.unlit_description: It has run out of fuel and needs to be lit again before it can work!

campfire_pot.description: Used by the Trapper to boil, render and cook.
campfire_pot.recipe_description: Required for boiling, rendering and simple cooking.
campfire_pot.flavor: The pot is a very useful survival tool

rc_smokehouse.description: Useful for efficiently smoking or curing products, slightly increasing their quality as well.
rc_smokehouse.unlit_description: It has run out of fuel and needs to be lit again before it can work!

na_smokehouse.description: Useful for efficiently smoking or curing products, slightly increasing their quality as well.
na_smokehouse.unlit_description: It has run out of fuel and needs to be lit again before it can work!

salt_box.description: Can be used to salt products, preserving them for longer and slightly increasing their quality.
salt_box.recipe_description: Can be used for curing a variety of products with salt, preserving them for a longer time and increasing their quality by 1.
salt_box.flavor: Salted goods can then be cured in a smokehouse for the best possible results!
salt_box.dirty_description: It's all dirty and moist. The salt must be replaced before it can be used again.

fox_hat.worn_description: Slightly increasing the Trapper's speed and diligence.
fox_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hat for a small speed and diligence increase.

smoking_pit.description: A firepit in a shallow hole to slowly smoke smaller meat cuts. Slightly reduces the meat quality.
smoking_pit.recipe_description: Can be used to slowly smoke meat cuts, but not whole meat pieces nor salted products. The quality of the smoked meats will be reduced by 1.
smoking_pit.flavor: An old-fashioned but definitely functional way to preserve food!
smoking_pit.unlit_description: It has run out of fuel to burn and requires more before it can work again!

smokehouse_simple.description: Used for smoking and curing products, both raw and salted.
smokehouse_simple.unlit_description: It has run out of fuel and needs to be lit again before it can work!
smokehouse_simple.recipe_description: A simple smokehouse that can be used to cure certain products like raw meats and sausages into edible, tasty foods.
smokehouse_simple.flavor: Smokehouses can cure salted goods into their best form!

shop_info.name: Uphilling Salt Mines
shop_info.title: A worker from a local salt mine has arrived

shop_info.name: Angor & Angst Salt Mines
shop_info.title: A trader from a big salt mine has arrived

shop_info.name: Cirdain's Whip Salt Mines
shop_info.title: A caravan from a famous salt mine is here for business

tanning_tub_stench.tooltip: Everyone can notice, can't they? Are they looking? I smell awful... I should really stay away from those horrid tanning tubs!

smoky_flavors.description:
Very strong, hearty smoke flavor! Muscle is increased, but Compassion is slightly decreased.
  • Crafting is slightly faster

poison_snake.description: Greatly reduces Muscle and Diligence. Slightly reduces Speed. This hearthling will be damaged in 2.5% of their total health every 30 minutes.
poison_snake.ace_description:
A dangerous natural venom. Can last a few days if untreated. Muscle and Diligence are greatly reduced, Speed is impaired.
  • üí¨ Type & Severity: Snake Venom (Severe)
  • üíä This venom needs to requires multiple treatments of Snake Antidote to be removed
  • üå°Ô∏è Greatly increased chances of developing High Fever and Infections while untreated!
  • üíúüîª Effective maximum health is somewhat lowered
  • üñ§ This venom greatly reduces the time a hearthling has to be rescued if knocked unconscious

snake_juice_worn_off_buff.description:
The bad taste and foul smell has left this hearthling a bit shaken for a while.
  • Willpower is greatly reduced

snake_juice_buff.description: Eww! Blergh! Slightly increases hunger and thirst but will protect from snake bites and their venom while active.

salty_flavors.description: Phew! Makes me thirsty... But quite tasty! Willpower and Stamina are increased, but Inspiration is slightly decreased.

cured_flavors.description:
Mmmm! This was perfectly preserved. Hearty! Muscle, Willpower, Stamina and Diligence are increased.
  • Crafting is quite faster

sundry_flavors.description: A bit too dry but has an exquisite, curious taste! Speed, Curiosity, Diligence and Inspiration are increased, but Muscle is slightly decreased.

red_meat.description: I've recently enjoyed some well-preserved red meat! Courage and Willpower are increased by 10%!

fish_meat.description: I've recently enjoyed some well-preserved fish meat! Curiosity and Compassion are increased by 10%!

white_meat.description: I've recently enjoyed some well-preserved white meat! Speed and Diligence are increased by 10%!

wild_meat.description: I've recently enjoyed some well-preserved wild game meat! Stamina and Muscle are increased by 10%!

tanning_tub.description: Order the Trapper to refill this vat and add another Pinch of Tannin to it so it can be used to tan hides again. This command is automatically issued whenever the tub needs it.

smokehouse.description: Order the Trapper to bring any common fuel and light this facility again. They must be able to access opening to light the fire. This command is automatically issued when needed.

salt_box.description: Order the Trapper to clean this salt box and replace the humid, dirty salt. This command will be issued automatically when needed.

proficient_category_trapper_frontier.description: Gained by reaching 100% proficiency in the "Frontier Survival" category as a Trapper.
proficient_category_trapper_frontier.1_description: They have mastered surviving on the edge of society, a true conqueror of the wilderness!

proficient_category_trapper_refiner.description: Gained by reaching 100% proficiency in any "Refinement" categories as a Trapper.
proficient_category_trapper_refiner.1_description: They have mastered the crafts of one category of refining skills as a Trapper.
proficient_category_trapper_refiner.3_description: They have mastered the crafts of two categories of refining skills as a Trapper.
proficient_category_trapper_refiner.5_description: They have mastered the crafts of three categories of refining skills as a Trapper.
proficient_category_trapper_refiner.9_description: They have mastered the crafts of all categories of refining skills as a Trapper! Amazing!

snake_hard.description: Careful with its hardened scales! Watch out for its teeth!

rawhide.description: Rawhide can be tanned into Thin Leather when processed in a tanning tub.
rawhide.recipe_description: Clean a large dried pelt, unhairing and degreasing it in preparation for tanning. Large pelts produce two pieces of Rawhide.
rawhide.small_recipe_description: Clean a small dried pelt, unhairing and degreasing it in preparation for tanning.

tannin.description: Milled from organics like wood, bark or leaves. Used in leather tanning.
tannin.recipe_description: Tannins are used by the Trapper to craft a Tanning Tub, which is usef for turning rawhides or raw skins into thin leather.
tannin.chestnut_recipe_description: A more advanced and efficient extraction technique, producing two items.
tannin.chestnut_flavor: Chestnut wood chips can be boiled to extract their tannins

fresh_pelt.description: Eww! Recently skinned, requires drying before being of any use.

fresh_rabbit_pelt.description: Recently skinned, requires drying to be usable. Rabbit pelts are very fast to dry!

fresh_zilla_skin.description: Eww! Scaly, rough and somewhat warm to the touch, requires a long time to dry.

thin_leather.description: Supple but not so strong. Can be woven into stronger bolts by a Weaver.
thin_leather.recipe_description: Prepared sheets of leather, ready to be put to good use.
thin_leather.flavor: A Trapper can tan pelts into Thin Leather

scaly_leather.description: Full of hardened, flexible scales. Can be woven into stronger bolts by a Weaver.

raw_skin.description: Raw skin can be tanned into scaly leather using a tanning tub.
raw_skin.recipe_description: Clean a dried scaly skin, degreasing and treating it in preparation for tanning. Large skins produce two pieces of Raw Scaly Skin.
raw_skin.small_recipe_description: Clean a small dried scaly skin, degreasing and treating it in preparation for tanning.

scaly_leather_boots.description: Fairly resistant scaly leather boots that grants Workers a minor speed bonus.

scaly_leather_bolt.recipe_description: Prepared sheets of scaly leather, ready to be put to good use.
scaly_leather_bolt.flavor: Scaly animals like the Varanus will provide scaly leather

animal_fat.description: Eww. It smells bad and looks gross!
animal_fat.recipe_description: Use a knife to trim the fat from a large piece of raw meat.
animal_fat.flavor: Eww. It smells bad and looks gross!

fresh_moomoo_pelt.description: Recently skinned, requires drying before being of any use. Moomoo pelts dry faster than usual.

fresh_oinker_pelt.description: Requires drying before being usable. Oinker pelts take long to dry but can be straight up used as Rawhide.

fresh_bear_pelt.description: Eww! Recently skinned, requires drying before being usable. Bear pelts take longer to dry...

input_rack_pelt_large.description: A special place for supplying your crafters with a pile of large pelts.

input_rack_pelt_small.description: A wall-mounted rack for small pelts to be easily stored.

input_rack_thin_leather.description: A resting place for your thin leather as soon as it leaves the tub.

output_rack_rawhide.description: A dry place for clean pelts to wait before the tanning tub.

fur_pile.description: Can be harvested for up to 48 fur pelts.
fur_pile.iconic_description: Place it so it can be harvested for fur pelts.
fur_pile.flavor: Very useful for stockpiling pelts or simply trading them in bulk

fur_pile_small.description: Can be harvested for up to 6 fur pelts.
fur_pile_small.iconic_description: Place it so it can be harvested for fur pelts.
fur_pile_small.flavor: Very useful for stockpiling pelts or simply trading them in bulk

input_bin_boiled_leather.description: A supply container, for quicker crafting.
input_bin_boiled_leather.recipe_description: A versatile container that Hearthlings will try to keep full, so your crafters can keep on working!

boiled_leather_chest.recipe_description: For beautifully storing up to 32 items.

boiled_leather_chest_small.recipe_description: For beautifully storing up to 16 items.

salt.description: A common seasoning also useful for preserving and curing.
salt.recipe_description: Grind rock salt into a versatile seasoning that is also useful for preserving and curing.
salt.flavor: Preservation and curing with salt is handled by the Trapper
salt.recipe_trapper_description: Boil and extract the salt from dried plant fibers. Salt is a versatile seasoning that is also useful for preserving and curing.
salt.flavor_trapper: Not the most efficient way but it will have to do

salt_smoked.description: An exquisite seasoning with a very bold flavor.

smoked_almond_basket.description: Softly cooked nuts with a smoky flavor.

smoked_chestnut_basket.description: Very popular and delicious smoked nuts, a nice treat during the winter.

smoked_hazelnut_basket.description: Flavorful nuts with a touch of smoke.

smoked_nuts_basket.description: An exquisite and diverse mix of smoked nuts.

smoked_walnut_basket.description: Hard outside, tender inside, with a spicy flavor of smoke.

smoked_cheese_aged.description: A delicious and firm cheese with a very strong flavor.

smoked_cheese_fresh.description: A soft cheese, almost creamy inside, with a salty taste.

smoked_cheese_mild.description: A firm, mild cheese with a fudgy taste and a sweet finish.

clump_of_rock_salt.description: Has a nice shine. Can be milled by a Cook into fine salt, a traditional seasoning.

beeswax.description: Malleable yet tough, the incredible work of bees. Can be used as a fine wax.

wax_vegetable.description: A soft and easy to mold organic product. Can be used as a poor wax.
wax_vegetable.flavor: Waxy plants are common in the desert or dry regions

wax_wool.description: Greasy and firm fat boiled from the wooly coat of a sheep. Can be used as fine wax.
wax_wool.flavor: The waxy grease of sheep wool helps them keep warm and dry

dwarfsbeard_bundle.description: Very tangled, greasy and rough. Can be used as thatching, fiber or a source of wax.

saltbush_bundle.description: Salty, rough leaves. Can be used as fiber, spun into thread or dried for boiling its salt out.
saltbush_bundle.drying_description: Drying is going well and it will soon be able to be boiled for fine salt.

saltbush_bundle_dry.description: No longer usable as fiber, it can now be used as thatching material or boiled for fine salt by a Trapper.

snake_skin.description: A long stretch of scaly, hard but supple skin.

fang_snake.description: Oof, there's venom dripping from it still!

boiled_leather.description: Able to harden and quite resistant, this leather can be intricately molded.

boiled_leather_cuirass.description: A durable yet lighter alternative for a knight's armor of choice.

boiled_leather_helmet.description: Resistant and fashionable, perfect for a knight.

boiled_leather_shield.description: Tough and reliable, a nice shield for a footman.

backpack_boiled_leather.description: Allows Workers to be much more efficient when hauling and restocking.
backpack_boiled_leather.recipe_description: Craft a very useful accessory that will allow Workers to be much more efficient at hauling.
backpack_boiled_leather.flavor: As efficient as a leather backpack but with alternative and cheaper materials

soap.description: Used for efficiently treating infections of any severity but also good for cleaning any cuts or piercing wounds.
soap.recipe_description: Used by Herbalists to efficiently treat infections of any severity and cutting or piercing wounds of low severity.

saltbush_seeds.recipe_description: Domesticate Saltbushes and learn how to farm them.
saltbush_seeds.recipe_flavor: Interact with the finished crate to unlock the crop. This will also consume this item

antidote_snake.description: This special medication is used by the Herbalist to hold back the venom from snake bites.
antidote_snake.recipe_description: Harness the venom of a snake fang to create three doses of life-saving antidote.
antidote_snake.recipe_flavor: Snake bites might require multiple treatments to be successful

snake_juice.description: Protects the town from snake venom, but won't cure people that are already infected. Drink if you see snakes!
snake_juice.recipe_description: A special tonic to be used preventively, disallowing the venom to settle in after a bite. Will not cure hearthlings that are already infected!
snake_juice.recipe_flavor: An old frontier recipe and the most horrible taste you'll ever experience

fresh_snake_skin.description: Eww! Recently skinned, requires drying before being usable. Snake skins dry faster than most skins!

fresh_skin.description: Eww! Scaly and rough, requires drying.

snake.description: Slithering the undergrowth, watch out for its venomous bite!

000.name: Saltbush Seedling
000.description: Will grow into a salty, fibrous shrub!

003.name: Budding Saltbush
003.description: Salt is already starting to accumulate on its leaves!

saltbush_crop.description: Takes a fair time to grow; Can be harvested for its salty fiber

saltbush.description: Source of salty fibers which can be boiled for fine salt.

saltbush_bud.description: Almost there, the leaves are accumulating salt!

saltbush_seed_ghost.description: Will grow into a salty bush that provides fiber which can be boiled for fine salt.
saltbush_seed_ghost.iconic_description: Can be planted to grow a bush that will provide salty fibers.
saltbush_seed_ghost.recipe_flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the fiber is destroyed in the process.

racoon_spirit.description: Diligence increased by 15 and Speed Increased by 10

rabbit_spirit.description: Compassion increased by 25 and Speed Increased by 10

tanning_tub.description: The smokes coming out of this tub are fetid and smell awful!

tanning_tub_stench.description: One shouldn't hang around the tanning vats for so long...

fox_spirit.description: Diligence increased by 15 and Speed Increased by 10

tannery_sign.description: A sign with the mark of the Trapper.

plushie_dragon.description: A bit fluffier than the original.

boar_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a boar.

cougar_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a cougar.

deer_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a deer.

fox_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a fox.

wolf_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a wolf.

bear_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a bear.

moomoo_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a moo-moo.

wild_cattle_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of wild cattle.

fish_smoked.description: Stringy and delicious cured white meat!

smoked_big_fish.description: This large chunk of fish meat has been perfectly smoked! Tender and juicy!

smoked_sausage.description: Tasty, stringy and encased ground meat cured in a smokery.

sausage.trapper_recipe_description: The trapper can, albeit less efficiently than a proper Cook, encase meat into sausages.

warm_wolf.description: Perhaps one of the best ideas ever was to put roast sausages inside common bread.
warm_wolf.flavor: Now we only need some kind of sauce...

animal_fat_rendered.description: It still smells odd and looks weird... Can be used as grease in cooking!
animal_fat_rendered.recipe_description: Boil and work this animal fat into an useful, rendered form.
animal_fat_rendered.flavor: Rendered animal fat has several uses like, for example, in cooking as an edible grease

animal_fat_rendered_lard.description: Greasy, flavorful pork fat. Can be used as grease but also as butter!
animal_fat_rendered_lard.recipe_description: Boil and work pork fat into an useful, rendered form.
animal_fat_rendered_lard.flavor: Known as lard, rendered pork fat can also be used as a spreading, like butter!

animal_fat_rendered_tallow.description: A special kind of fat. Can be used as grease, cooking oil and even as poor wax!
animal_fat_rendered_tallow.recipe_description: Boil and work steak fat into an useful, rendered form.
animal_fat_rendered_tallow.flavor: Tallow has many uses, can be used as oil for deep frying and even as a poor wax

bug_meat_soup.description: Watery and weak but better than nothing.
bug_meat_soup.recipe_description: It's not as good as a stew but should be better than nothing.
bug_meat_soup.flavor: It has boiled bugs and, well... More boiled bugs!

pemmican.description: Not really tasty but very nutritious and long lasting survivalist food.
pemmican.recipe_description: Dried meat ground alongside berries and rendered fat provide a long lasting and nutritious meal for enduring the wilderness.
pemmican.flavor: Conserved in small rawhide sacks, well made pemmican can last for years

cured_fish_meat.description: Thin, crunchy and stringy. Has a peculiar flavor.

smoked_pork.description: A tender smoked piece of pork meat.

smoked_mutton.description: A crisp and nicely smoked piece of meat.

smoked_poultry.description: Fleshy and tender, smoked poultry meat.

smoked_steak.description: A thin and well smoked steak of meat.

smoked_varanus.description: An exotic and not so tasty meat, smoked.

smoked_venison.description: Delicious wild game smoked to perfection.

smoked_fish_meat.description: Nutritious, stringy, but not that flavorful...

salted_fish_meat.description: Salty and crispy, not so enjoyable. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_big_fish.description: Very dry and salty, but still juicy inside! Can be further cured in a smokery.

fish_salted.description: Crisp and dry outside. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_mutton.description: Crispy and nicely salted. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_pork.description: This salted pork is particularly good. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_poultry.description: Hearty and crunchy piece of salted fowl. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_poyo.description: The salty, well preserved chest piece of a poyo. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_sausage.description: Seasoned to perfection, can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_steak.description: Tender and juicy, if not a bit salty... Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_varanus.description: Exotic and tender. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_venison.description: A valuable and fancy piece of game meat, can be further cured in a smokery.

cured_big_fish.description: A deliciously flavored and smoked chunk of fish meat.

cured_fish.description: A stringy and salty whole fish, very tasty!

cured_mutton.description: Perfectly salted and smoked rack of meat, ready to be eaten!

cured_pork.description: A hearty, juicy large bit of smoked pork.

cured_poultry.description: Well seasoned and smoked fowl meat.

cured_poyo.description: A refined and tasty poyo breast with a crispy, salty crust.

cured_duck.description: The unique duck flavors perfectly combined with salty, smoked fat.

cured_steak.description: It's like a giant cured meat piece!

cured_varanus.description: Something so bad turned into something so good...

cured_venison.description: Delicious and flavorful game meat, smoked to perfection.

raw_bacon.description: It's bacon! But it needs curing in a smokery to become its true self...

raw_wild_meat.description: Not good for consumption, needs curing in a smokery or usage in cooking!

raw_red_meat.description: Not good for consumption, needs curing in a smokery or usage in cooking!

raw_red_meat_small.description: Not good for consumption, needs curing in a smokery or usage in cooking!

raw_white_meat_small.description: Not good for consumption, needs curing in a smokery or usage in cooking!

raw_wild_meat_small.description: Not good for consumption, needs curing in a smokery or usage in cooking!

meat.description: Definitely not good for consumption anymore...

salted_duck.description: Delicious, tender duck meat preserved with salt.

salted_fish.description: This fish has been completely dry with salt, giving it a rich, stringy flavor.

cured_red_meat.description: A delicious and expertly cured piece of domestic red meat jerky.

cured_red_meat_small.description: A smaller but still delicious bit of well cured, domestic red meat jerky.

cured_white_meat.description: A very nicely cured piece of white meat with a rich flavor.

cured_white_meat_small.description: A bite-sized piece of exquisitely cured white meat.

cured_wild_meat.description: A nice, boldly flavored chunk of wild meat, cured to perfection.

cured_wild_meat_small.description: Don't underestimate its size! This small piece of well preserved meat tastes great!

salted_red_meat.description: A dry, nutritious slice of domestic red meat preserved in salt.

salted_white_meat.description: A tasty, dehydrated bit of poultry preserved in salt.

salted_wild_meat.description: A hearty chunk of wild meat that has been preserved with salt.

smoked_duck.description: Smoked to crispy perfection. Very flavorful and exotic!

smoked_fish.description: This whole fish has been smoked for a very nutritious, tasty meal!

smoked_red_meat.description: A stringy but juicy chunk of meat preserved with smoke.

smoked_white_meat.description: A sizeable chunk of poultry preserved with flavorful smoke.

smoked_wild_meat.description: Lean, whild meat cut preserved in smoke. Very nutritious!

salted_red_meat_small.description: A bite-sized chunk of salted domestic meat.

salted_white_meat_small.description: A tiny bit of white meat that was left in a salt box for a while.

salted_wild_meat_small.description: A bit of the wilderness in a nice, preserving salty crust.

smoked_red_meat_small.description: A small piece of lean, domestic meat smoked to perfection.

smoked_white_meat_small.description: A small nugget of white meat given texture and flavor by smoke.

smoked_wild_meat_small.description: A small bit of wild, lean meat. A bit stringy but very flavorful!

raw_white_meat.description: Not good for consumption, needs curing in a smokery or usage in cooking!

raw_meat.decay_1_description: This meat is going bad. Must be consumed soon!

fur_coat.worn_description: Warm and cozy, keeps the cold away...
fur_coat.description: Workers can wear this thick coat which provides protection to freezing weather.
